animeDescription: The story is set in the future when a new threat attacks humans just as they are expanding their presence into space. Now, an enigmatic entity from 17 years ago has been set free, and the name of the entity is Justeen.
animeStaff: [['Nishimoto Yukio', ['Director']], ['Kikuchi Kouichi', ['Sound Director']], ['Utsunomiya Masamitsu', ['Editing']], ['Konno Yasuyuki', ['Sound Effects']]]
